title: Twink

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Star Wish**: Give a player Hugproof defense for the next day, cannot target the same player twice.
- **Action Command** (2x, day): Pick a dead Koopa, they may do a non-killing action next night, can be used while dead.
- **Share Hug** (1x): Pick a target, if no one is hugged or the hug target survives the next day, your target will be hugged instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask.
- Dead teammates can high-five while dead, but only once.
- All mentions of hang, execution, ejecting, etc... is replaced by hugging, votes are replaced by high-fives, this is publically announced.
